title: Perception and Application of Pedagogical Value: Online Workshop for Elementary Science Educators (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of elementary science curriculum and basic teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: Pedagogical improvement program for elementary science education managers in educational enterprises. Conducted asynchronously in a BYOD environment, emphasizing interaction via LMS discussion boards and collaboration tools

learning_goals: Participants can analyze the value structures of various teaching methods and select at least three approaches suitable for science classes.
Participants can identify differences in teaching method perceptions with peer educators with 80% accuracy through surveys and comparative analysis.
Participants can write a 5-page report reflecting how personal value types influence teaching method selection through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
